channel.title: version control on Good Fast
channel.description: Recent content in version control on Good Fast

item.title: Efficient git command line & reasonable workflo
item.description: Owning a software development shop, or being the prolific master coder that you are, what would you say is your most valuable assit? Is it your carefully acquired intellectual capital in the form of your people / your awesome self? Is it your revolutionary, novel ideas? Perhaps it’s both of those, in some sense, but how about something more mundane, like the great code written in the last hour, or day or months?
